BibleWord.Commentary: If a man shall sanctify unto the LORD some part of a field of his possession, then your estimation shall be according to the seed thereof: an homer of barley seed shall be valued at fifty shekels of silver (Leviticus 27:16).

ClassAssociates.Commentary: Put the 2 Gildan Active Wear Ultra Cotton (TM) Heavyweight M 100% Algodon Pre-Encogido Hecho En Honduras 100% Coton Pre-Retreci Fabrique Au Honduras 100% Cotton Preshrunk Made IN HONDURAS Machine wash warm, inside out, with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry medium. Medium/hot iron. Do not iron decoration. RN93846. CA25181. Computer on, record the butterfly, shower, garage noise ...
